pullRequest.title: [RW-4383][risk=no] Puppeteer DataSet test
pullRequest.bodyText:
New Puppeteer tests that covers following features:

Create DataSet without Export to Notebook
Export dataset to notebook in Python language
Edit a DataSet
Rename a DataSet
Delete a DataSet
Create new cohort

Additional changes in some existing files were required in order to support writing of new tests.

nodes.bodyText: In the future, if large refactoring changes like this can be split out from the PR, that would be very helpful for giving quicker review turnaround. To review 500+ LOC all at once, I need to set aside a significant amount of time. In comparison, ~400 lines of mechanical refactoring changes alone is easy - and 100 lines of new tests is easy.
That doesn't make sense - I suspect something else was going on when you observed this. Is this reproducible?
nit: I don't think the boolean type should be necessary in this situation; type I believe should just be implicit based ont he default value
It seems like this should really be two different methods. Overloading both capabilities here is making the interaction a bit confusing in my opinion
These should probably be constants
This comment seems to be the opposite of what the following code is doing
The default will already be selected. If you intend to test the default behavior, I would not touch the selector
nit: fix indentation for all comments in this file. These shouldn't be indented deeper than the code
Side-note, not for this PR: we should really make this case insensitive at least, if we're depending on text like this
Test description says to delete the dataset - I don't see that part

Yes, good feedback. I will try do that in future. Sorry about this. As for why, I was improving code to address an annoyance in this class (this.element in many functions is undefined if it wasn't initialized). I went ahead to address it and changed other functions to get consistency in code. because I would otherwise forget about it later.
I don't remember much now. It could be just "test" env was "busy" at the time. I'm removing the 2 min timeout and comment.
Makes sense. Two methods after split: selectAllValues() and selectValues().
corrected comments.

I'd like to keep this if you don't object for following reasons:

Existence of Select menu and options in dropdown.
Select menu is not readonly.
Options is available and selectable.
👍 A welcome change if it happens.
Missed it. Added delete Dataset and Notebook.
nit: I would expect the default to be true, given the method name. Alternatively, I would probably just remove the default here.
nit: probably make the parameter non-optional now, I think the below code breaks if it's null/undefind
This is a repeat of line 28
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -27,6 +27,7 @@ beforeAll(async () => {
        || host === 'accounts.youtube.com'
        || host === 'static.zdassets.com'
        || host === 'play.google.com'
+       || host === 'static.zdassets.com'

nodes.bodyText: right, default set to true.
right, param is set as non-optional.
🙂 removed.

        || host === 'static.zdassets.com'
        || host === 'play.google.com'
